related_questions.question: Contoh percakapan 5 orang tentang borrowing a book the library

answers.answer:
andi : hi guys , how are you ? , have you guys prepared for tomorrow’s lesson

marsya : hi andi , we’re good , what lesson?

andi : it’s english lesson mr. thomas will be teaching us tomorrow but i lost my book

sari : “ oh my god i forgot tomorrow will be the most important lesson , if we dont bring the book mr. thomas will get mad at us “

tono : “ guys relaxx .. we have library in our school “

joey : “ yeah .. that’s right you guys no need to worry mrs . milla will help us to find the book “

andi : “ thank god , i thought our school doesn’t provide us that kind of book we wanted “

marsya : “ well ... let’s go to library then before its close “

andi : “ alright “

related_questions.question:
Fill in the blanks with tobe (am/ is/ are).    For example : My mother ... beautiful.
 My mother is beautiful.
 (She)
1.My friends ... in the library.

2.I and my brothers ... at our uncle home.

3.My sisters ... diligent and smart.

4.My aunts ... kind and beuatiful.

5.The tiger ... wild.

6.The sharpener ... sharp.

7.Anton and Andi ... in the field.

8.My niece ... still baby.

9.The teachers ... in the classroom.

10.My grandmother and my grandfather ... at our home.

pliss dijawab
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. is

2. are

3. is

4. is

5. is

6. is

7. are

8. is

9. are

10. are

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)

related_questions.question:
Essays    1. Give 2 examples how to offering help
2 What is "Narative Text"

3. Write 2 sentences using "should"
4. Name 2 examples of "Quantifiers"
5. Give 1 sentence of "Simple Past Tense"


​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. a. Would you like some help?

b. May i offer you some help?

2. A narrative text is a piece of text which tells a story which entertains the reader or listener.

3. a. Adam, I'm afraid that you should definitely see a dentist.

b. Robin, I think you should study more.

4. a. I saw few people in the program.

b. Liam has many friends here.

5. He wrote this masterpiece yesterday.

related_questions.question: Lirik lagu que sera sera menjelaskan tentang ap??​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Saat aku masih kecil

When I was just a little girl

Saya bertanya kepada ibu saya, saya akan menjadi apa?

I asked my mother, what will I be

Apakah saya akan cantik?

Will I be pretty

Apakah saya akan kaya?

Will I be rich

Inilah yang dia katakan padaku

Here's what she said to me

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang terjadi terjadilah

Whatever will be, will be

Masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat

The future's not ours to see

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang akan terjadi terjadilah

What will be, will be

Saat aku dewasa dan jatuh cinta

When I grew up and fell in love

Aku bertanya pada kekasihku, apa yang ada di depan

I asked my sweetheart, what lies ahead

Akankah kita memiliki pelangi?

Will we have rainbows

Hari demi hari

Day after day

Inilah yang dikatakan kekasihku

Here's what my sweetheart said

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang terjadi terjadilah

Whatever will be, will be

Masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat

The future's not ours to see

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang akan terjadi terjadilah

What will be, will be

Sekarang saya punya anak sendiri

Now I have children of my own

Mereka bertanya pada ibu mereka, aku akan jadi apa?

They ask their mother, what will I be

Apakah saya akan tampan?

Will I be handsome

Apakah saya akan kaya?

Will I be rich

Saya memberi tahu mereka dengan lembut

I tell them tenderly

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang terjadi terjadilah

Whatever will be, will be

Masa depan bukan milik kita untuk dilihat

The future's not ours to see

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Apa yang akan terjadi terjadilah

What will be, will be

Que sera, sera

Que sera, sera

Penjelasan:

ke kahawatiran se orang anak akn masa depan nya

one sister and two brothers. My sister's name is Tasya
and my brothers' names are Bimo and Zaky. My father's
name is Bambang and my mother's name is Alya. I live
with my family at 7 Batu Sangkar Street.
I am twelve years old. Tasya is ten years old. Bimo
is six years old. Zaky is three years old. My father is
fourty three and my mother is fourty. We are good
family

b. 6

c. 10
d. 12
Ut?​

c.10

related_questions.question:
15. Retell the story in past time    a. Descriptive text c. Narrative text
b. Report text
d. Recount text

16. The purpose of Recount text
a.
To amuse
c. To promote
b. To report
d. To describe

17. Generic Structure
a. Identification
c. Events
b. Description d. Evaluation

18. Retell the experience of the writer in past time
a. Personal Recount c. Fiction recount
b. Factual Recount d. Imaginative Recount

bantu jwab ya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

15.Recount Text

16.To Amuse

17.Events

18.Personal Recount

Penjelasan:

16.UNTUK MENGHIBUR

18.BUAT PENULIS BERARTI PERSONAL YA
